string.name: instructions
string.big: Exporting: A new folder named \"Notepad\" will be created at the path /sdcard. Inside the \"Notepad\" folder, a new file named \"notepad.txt\" will be created with the title and contents of every note.\nImporting: Make sure a folder named \"Notepad\" exists at the path /sdcard. Also make sure that a file named \"notepad.txt\" exists inside that folder.
